---
id: payment-slip-bulk
title: "Generate multiple payment slips for default account (bulk)"
description: "This method is called to send multiple instances of payment slip to be procesed by our infratructure."
sidebar_label: "Generate multiple payment slips for default account (bulk)"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Generate multiple payment slips for default account (bulk)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/bulk"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is called to send multiple instances of payment slip to be procesed by our infratructure.
The maximum number of payment slips that can be created in the same request is 25.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

Can be used in response corelation.","type":"string"},"amount":{"description":"Amount in cents to be transfered. Example: 100 = R$1.00","type":"integer"},"dueDate":{"format":"date","description":"Due date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd","type":"string"},"customer":{"description":"Customer that will be charged.
